GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an article object with relevant key-value pairs

exampleResponse.title: Student SUES Mitch!
exampleResponse.author: rogersop
exampleResponse.body: We all love Mitch and his wonderful, unique typing style. However, the volume of his typing has ALLEGEDLY burst another students eardrums, and they are now suing for damages

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of comments posted for an article in descending order

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: posts a comment to an existing article
